name: Clean this mess!
description:
"Clean this mess !" is a game we made for the 40th Ludum Dare as videogame students.

Our game is about feeding kids in time before they start throwing a tantrum, and keeping the cafetaria clean. The more kids, the worse it gets.

We were 7 students working on this game:

Louis Valet, Thomas Polfliet, Quentin Donnaint, Maxime Catel, Simon Prigent, Nathan Messin and Sullivan Devroede (aKa Soulimane ).
